status_updates.description:
ClassicBitcoin Mining Bonus, Earn upto 500% more mining the most profitable cryptocurrency. 
Bonus mining starts from block 295000 to block 500000.

The aim of the new update is to ensure CBTC remains the most profitable mineable cryptocurrency, The new update will provide miner bonuses to ensure CBTC mining profitability is significantly higher than the best on the current market.

https://bitclassic.info

ClassicBitcoin (CBTC version 2.0.2) is ready and MANDATORY wallet updates are available to download from the front page of the marketplace website (https://bitclassic.info) or on github (https://github.com/ClassicBitcoins/cbitcoin/releases/latest).

ClassicBitcoin CBTC Liquidity Fork

CBTC Liquidity Mining starts at Block 170000 to 190000 on or before 31st Jan 2021.
The bonus period will last 30 days and generates 500% more coins for CBTC Liquidity miners.
All Miners and Pools are Welcome to join.
https://bitclassic.info

ClassicBitcoin CBTC v2.0.1 is ready for download
https://github.com/ClassicBitcoins/cbitcoin/releases/latest

New Updates in v2 include:
CBTC Stablecoin Liquidity Mining.
500% more reward for CBTC Liquidity Miners.
No Mandatory Community Fee and more.
https://bitclassic.info
